title: Login issue
description: Customer unable to log into the system with correct credentials.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Payment is failing intermittently for credit card transactions.

title: Page not loading
description: Dashboard page is taking too long to load for some users.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: Customer requested a dark mode option for the web app.

title: Mobile app crash
description: App crashes when navigating to the settings screen.

title: Email notifications not received
description: Some users are not getting password reset emails.

title: Incorrect invoice amount
description: Customer was billed twice for the same service.

title: Broken image links
description: Product images are not loading on the shop page.

title: Slow API response
description: Reports API taking more than 10 seconds to respond.

title: Account locked
description: User account locked after multiple failed login attempts.
